00087   struct StatusFilter
00088   {
00089 public:
00090     bool showUnversioned;
00091     bool showUnmodified;
00092     bool showModified;    
00093     bool showConflicted;
00094     bool showIgnored;
00095     bool showExternals;
00096 
00097     StatusFilter()
00098       : showUnversioned(false), showUnmodified(false),
00099         showModified(false), showConflicted(false),
00100         showExternals(false)
00101     {
00102     }
00103   };
